segments.text: Have you seen the movie Batwoman ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , not yet . Is it good ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it's quite amusing , actually . Good plot , and Sharon Stone's in it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , she's good . She must be getting on a bit now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it's about this woman who got murdered because she discovered some company secrets about the cosmetics company she worked for . But then she got reincarnated as a cat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . Stay with me . She then decided to get her revenge by revealing the company secret and killing the boss . First , though , she had to discover her true cat nature . At the end she had a big fight with Sharon Stone , who was the real danger in the company . She had actually murdered the boss , who was her husband , and then tried to frame Batwoman for the murder , so everyone thought Batwoman was evil .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Batwoman married the boss ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . Sharon Stone was married to the boss , who treated her badly , so she killed him . So where was I ? OK , so then , at the same time she fell in love with a cop , who was investigating the murder of the boss . Finally , she ditched the cop to follow her feline nature .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wait a minute , I'm lost . The cop killed the boss ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Haven't you been listening to a word I've been saying ?
segments.speaker: S1
